description: This file contains utility functions for processing media content such as audio and images, including encoding, formatting, and preparing data for use with AI models. It handles external references, encoding media files, and converting them into message-compatible formats.

methods.name: audio_to_message
methods.description: Converts a sequence of Audio objects into message format with base64-encoded audio data, handling raw data, URLs, and file paths.

methods.name: images_to_message
methods.description: Converts a sequence of Image objects into message format with base64-encoded images or URLs.

methods.name: process_image
methods.description: Processes an Image object, encoding it based on its source (URL, file path, or bytes) and adding optional details.
